Name: L.A. Noire: Nicholson Electroplating
Overview: Nicholson Electroplating is an Arson case in L.A. Noire. It is the first downloadable content pack for the game. The first 16 customers who bought a copy of L.A. Noire at one of Best Buy's midnight openings received a code to obtain this downloadable content when it released.[1] "Nicholson Electroplating" was released on June 21, 2011.[2] It was later included in the Complete Edition for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, and PC. It is now a storyline case in the remastered version.
